# pointwiseMax(_:_:)

**Function**

The lanewise maximum of two vectors.

## Declaration

```swift
func pointwiseMax<T>(_ a: T, _ b: T) -> T where T : SIMD, T.Scalar : FloatingPoint
```

## Discussion

Each element of the result is the maximum of the corresponding elements of the inputs.

## Supporting Functions

- **all(_:)**: True if every lane of mask is true.
- **any(_:)**: True if any lane of mask is true.
- **pointwiseMax(_:_:)**: The lanewise maximum of two vectors.
- **pointwiseMin(_:_:)**: The lanewise minimum of two vectors.
- **pointwiseMin(_:_:)**: The lanewise minimum of two vectors.
